description:
Seeing is believing with this clear coffee press that can stand up to the rigors of outdoor brewing. It’s made from crystal clear and shatterproof Tritan™ that is more durable and sustainable than traditional plastic. It serves up tasty American or espresso-style caffeine hits while looking good doing it.

  • Made of shatterproof Tritan™ that’s tough enough for every backcountry brew
  • Rapid, total immersion brewing process makes full-flavoured coffee without bitterness
  • Makes 1 to 3 cups per pressing in about a minute
  • Micro-filter means no grit in your cup (unlike a French press)
  • Includes Tritan™ chamber and plunger, filter cap, 100 filters and holder, stirrer, and scoop
  • BPA and phthalate free
name: Aeropress Aeropress Clear Coffee Press
